com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo

Class PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler
  • Enclosing class:
    PlaybackControlLayer

    private static class PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler
extends Handler
    Message handler which allows us to send delayed messages to the PlaybackControlLayer This is useful for fading out the view after a certain time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.ref.WeakReference<PlaybackControlLayer> playbackControlLayer
      A reference to the PlaybackControlLayer that we are handling messages for.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler(PlaybackControlLayer playbackControlLayer) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleMessage(Message msg)
      Receives either a PlaybackControlLayer.FADE_OUT message (which hides the playback control layer) or a PlaybackControlLayer.SHOW_PROGRESS message (which updates the seek bar to reflect the progress in the video).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • playbackControlLayer

        private final java.lang.ref.WeakReference<PlaybackControlLayer> playbackControlLayer
        A reference to the PlaybackControlLayer that we are handling messages for.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler

        private PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler(PlaybackControlLayer playbackControlLayer)
        Parameters:
        playbackControlLayer - The PlaybackControlLayer we should handle messages for.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(Message msg)
        Receives either a PlaybackControlLayer.FADE_OUT message (which hides the playback control layer) or a PlaybackControlLayer.SHOW_PROGRESS message (which updates the seek bar to reflect the progress in the video).
        Parameters:
        msg - Either a PlaybackControlLayer.FADE_OUT or PlaybackControlLayer.SHOW_PROGRESS message.
